product_name: Burton TWC Cannon Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: The waterproof, breathable Burton TWC Cannon jacket is built for mid-winter shredding, and anytime you need a reliable jacket to keep you warm and dry. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) 2-layer coated nylon shell with fully taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. 60g Thermacore(TM) insulation in the body and 40g in the sleeves and hood is placed strategically to retain warmth and keep you comfortable on cold days. Embossed taffeta lining helps wick moisture and dries fast to keep you comfortable. Flip up the hood to keep wind and swirling snow out. Open up the mesh-lined pit zippers to vent body heat quickly. Includes dual-entry chest and hand pockets and an internal media/goggles pocket. Waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). The Burton TWC Cannon jacket is built for layering without being overly baggy; sleeves are designed with a bit of extra length to fit over your gloves and keep snow out.
short_description: The waterproof, breathable Burton TWC Cannon jacket is built for mid-winter shredding, and anytime you need a reliable jacket to keep you warm and dry.
